summary: "Alien Resurrection" (1997) is the fourth movie in the Alien series. Directed by Jean-Pierre Jeunet and written by Joss Whedon, it stars Sigourney Weaver and Winona Ryder. Set 200 years after the previous film, Ripley is cloned and an Alien queen is removed from her body. The military wants to breed Aliens for study, but they escape. Ripley and mercenaries try to destroy the spaceship before it reaches Earth. The film made less money in the U.S. than its predecessors and got mixed reviews. Though a sequel was planned, it was abandoned due to the "Alien vs. Predator" series.
title: Alien Resurrection
